dcterms:creator: David Melhart
Antonios Liapis
Georgios N. Yannakakis
dcterms:description: The AGAIN dataset contains gameplay data and annotations of arousal (emotional intensity) provided by over 100 players of a racing game, allowing for the analysis of player behavior and experience.
dcterms:title: AGAIN dataset

dcterms:creator: David Melhart
Antonios Liapis
Georgios N. Yannakakis
dcterms:description: The Solid dataset is part of the AGAIN dataset and includes 108 human play sessions with player-annotated arousal traces, specifically for the Solid Rally racing game.
dcterms:title: Solid dataset
